article: the common thread throughout `` unk , '' the new fashion exhibit at the metropolitan museum of art , is n't tartan plaid , savile row suits or even unk slashed t-shirts , though they 're all adequately represented .
abstract: unk keeps its british sense of humor in new york fashion exhibit
